verbose_text: The Toll like receptors (TLRs) TLR1 and TLR2 promote Treg proliferation by increasing glycolysis but also impair Treg-suppressive capacity in mice, whereas TLR8 signaling selectively inhibits glucose uptake and glycolysis in human Tregs and inhibits their suppressive function.
evidence: Toll-like receptors (TLRs) TLR1 and TLR2 promote Treg
